definition: an earthen jar made of baked clay, to soil with or as with crock
details:
noun
- an earthen jar made of baked clay
= example: an earthen jar made of baked clay
= synonyms: earthenware jar
- nonsense
= synonyms: cobblers
- a black colloidal substance consisting wholly or principally of amorphous carbon and used to make pigments and ink
= synonyms: smut
verb
- to soil with or as with crock
- to release color when rubbed, of badly dyed fabric
